scripts.build: set -uex; yarn run build:doc; yarn run build:code
scripts.test:built: set -uex; yarn run build; mocha test/built
scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --access restricted --tag testing
scripts.release:patch2: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access restricted; git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; npm publish --access restricted;
